short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: warns potential victims about scams that use legitimate remote viewing software

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension will warn you when you load pages commonly used in scams. We hope that this simple extension will save you or your loved ones from becoming the victim of a scam. You won't notice this extension until you land on one of the sites it looks for. The sites it warns you about are legitimate remote access sites that credible companies may have you use, but they are also used by scam tech support and refund scammers. We believe that giving you information on how the scam works at the right moment will be enough to stop scams in their tracks.

this extension will warn you when you load one of these sites. It will  inform you how the scams work. the warning can be cleared after reading and it won't display again for two hours so you can use the site if you decide you are not in a malicious situation.
